埲字的基本解释

埲
běng
〔塕（
w噉g ）埲〕尘土飞扬。

埲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［běng］
［《廣韻》蒲蠓切，上董，並。］
亦作“埄1”。
尘土。
[②]［bàng］
地名用字。贵州荔波县有蒙古埲、穷来埲等。旧时土司头目叫“埲目”。

埲字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　埲； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页231第03
【廣韻】【集韻】?蒲蠓切，音菶。塵起貌。　又【集韻】補孔切，音琫。義同。

埲字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
埲字的起名意思

暂无。

埲
Basic explanation of words
埲
běng
〔塕（
w啖g ）埲〕It's dusty.
埲
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［běng］
["Guangyun" Pu Ling cut, go to Dong, and merge. ]
Also known as "埄1".
dust.
[②]［bàng］
Place names in words. In Libo County, Guizhou, there are Mongol Sang and Qiong Lai Sang. In the old days, the chieftain of the chieftain was called "Saimu".
埲
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　埲; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 231 03
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Pu Ling cut, sound calamus. Dust looks.　[Jiyun] Make up the hole and cut, sound 琫. The same meaning.
